caption.p: ( a) Cyclic voltammetry of a 5 mM DSMeQUI 20 solution in a Brittonâ€“Robinson universal buffer solution with added KCl at various pHs. The voltammograms were recorded at a scan rate of 100 mV/s using a 3 mm diameter glassy carbon disk electrode. ( b) The reduction (red) and oxidation (black) peak potential and average peak potential (green) as a function of pH.
